data.text:
Hmm... Let me see if I've got this straight... 
So she doesn't want you to help her with her training, right? 
...I assume there's a reason you wanted to help her?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Hmm... Let me see if I've got this straight... 
<story>So she doesn't want you to help her with her training, right? 
<story>...I assume there's a reason you wanted to help her?

data.text: Hehe. The two of you are really close, so... Hmm... She's working really hard, and you want to be there for her. Does that sound about right?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: Hehe. The two of you are really close, so... Hmm... She's working really hard, and you want to be there for her. Does that sound about right?

data.text:
Affirmative. But... Neo Universe is "4.2 light years" away. 
Even "PSYC" can't...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Affirmative. But... Neo Universe is "4.2 light years" away. 
<story>Even "PSYC" can't...

data.text:
"Neutrino". 
『Nothing's wrong』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"Neutrino". 
<story>『Nothing's wrong』.

data.text:
Have you considered... Maybe Rob Roy really does want your 
help? It could be that she just doesn't know how to respond.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Have you considered... Maybe Rob Roy really does want your 
<story>help? It could be that she just doesn't know how to respond.

data.text:
Whenever you did something for Rob Roy, how did she react? 
Try and remember.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Whenever you did something for Rob Roy, how did she react? 
<story>Try and remember.

data.text: ――Rob Roy... Rob Roy's "signal" was...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――Rob Roy... Rob Roy's "signal" was...
<story>――
<story>――

data.text: ......『Disoriented』...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>......『Disoriented』...?

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy's responses included 『Thank you』and 
『your kindness』. "Aid" provided should have "matched" needs. 
But...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy's responses included 『Thank you』and 
<story>『your kindness』. "Aid" provided should have "matched" needs. 
<story>But...

data.text:
......The "signal" was entirely 『disoriented』. 
『Why』......?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>......The "signal" was entirely 『disoriented』. 
<story>『Why』......?

data.text:
She didn't know why you would go out of your way to help her, 
or why you were so concerned with her.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>She didn't know why you would go out of your way to help her, 
<story>or why you were so concerned with her.

data.text:
So, as happy as she was to have your help, I think she felt a little 
bit guilty about the whole thing.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>So, as happy as she was to have your help, I think she felt a little 
<story>bit guilty about the whole thing.

data.text:
Rob Roy's a real sweetheart. I could see a timid girl like her 
being reluctant to accept so much kindness.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Rob Roy's a real sweetheart. I could see a timid girl like her 
<story>being reluctant to accept so much kindness.

data.text:
.......?? 
"Not knowing why" became『reluctance』...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>.......?? 
<story>"Not knowing why" became『reluctance』...?

data.text:
――I'm getting kinda hungry. You want a snack? 
It just so happens I've got a little something for us.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>――I'm getting kinda hungry. You want a snack? 
<story>It just so happens I've got a little something for us.

data.text:
Here. Roast yam, one of my favorites. 
I've only got the one, unfortunately... How about we go halfsies?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Here. Roast yam, one of my favorites. 
<story>I've only got the one, unfortunately... How about we go halfsies?

data.text:
Just pulling your leg. 
I had some earlier, so you can have the whole thing.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Just pulling your leg. 
<story>I had some earlier, so you can have the whole thing.

data.text:
Neo Universe would prefer "HAF" over "HOL"―― 
.......
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Neo Universe would prefer "HAF" over "HOL"―― 
<story>.......

data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>...........『Thank you』.

data.text: Universe. ――You chose not to "tell" me something just now, didn't you?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: Universe. ――You chose not to "tell" me something just now, didn't you?

data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――!

data.text: Are you sure you're okay with this? You can take the whole thing yourself, or split it with me... What do you really want to do?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: Are you sure you're okay with this? You can take the whole thing yourself, or split it with me... What do you really want to do?

data.text:
Let me hear your thoughts. 
"Tell" me how you really feel.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Let me hear your thoughts. 
<story>"Tell" me how you really feel.

data.text:
............"HAF"....... 
Neo Universe "seeks"『warmth』. 
"THRF"―― "Vector": ...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>............"HAF"....... 
<story>Neo Universe "seeks"『warmth』. 
<story>"THRF"―― "Vector": ...

data.text: "HAF", not "HOL"―― "Vector": 『Halfsies』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>"HAF", not "HOL"―― "Vector": 『Halfsies』.

data.text: Heehee. Don't mind if I do!
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>Heehee. Don't mind if I do!

data.text:
――Warm and tasty. Something about splitting food with 
someone else makes it taste even better. 
It's nice, knowing we're sharing something between us.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>――Warm and tasty. Something about splitting food with 
<story>someone else makes it taste even better. 
<story>It's nice, knowing we're sharing something between us.

data.text: ――! ......Sphira. Neo Universe "agrees".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: ――! ......Sphira. Neo Universe "agrees".

data.text:
Communicating with Rob Roy is the same way. 
...Don't give up on trying to "tell" her how you feel.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Communicating with Rob Roy is the same way. 
<story>...Don't give up on trying to "tell" her how you feel.

data.text:
『Telling』... 
Is "EXDFF" for Neo Universe...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>『Telling』... 
<story>Is "EXDFF" for Neo Universe...

data.text: I'm guessing that means it's hard for you? ...But that yam was really good, right? And it's only because you did your best to "tell" me how you felt that both of us got to taste it.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: I'm guessing that means it's hard for you? ...But that yam was really good, right? And it's only because you did your best to "tell" me how you felt that both of us got to taste it.

data.text:
I know you love Rob Roy a whole lot, and you want to be there 
for her―― But I think she can only accept those feelings if you 
"tell" her about them.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>I know you love Rob Roy a whole lot, and you want to be there 
<story>for her―― But I think she can only accept those feelings if you 
<story>"tell" her about them.

data.text:
We talked about how we exchange gifts at the Moon Viewing 
Social, right? That's another way to "tell" how you feel――
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>We talked about how we exchange gifts at the Moon Viewing 
<story>Social, right? That's another way to "tell" how you feel――

data.text: You're not the first to go through this. The circumstances were a little different, but I can remember another girl who had trouble telling her friend how she felt.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: You're not the first to go through this. The circumstances were a little different, but I can remember another girl who had trouble telling her friend how she felt.

data.text:
She wanted to say things like "I'm rooting for you," or 
"You light up my life". Things she couldn't bring herself to 
say out loud, things she kept locked up in her heart――
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>She wanted to say things like "I'm rooting for you," or 
<story>"You light up my life". Things she couldn't bring herself to 
<story>say out loud, things she kept locked up in her heart――

data.text:
So she borrowed a little confidence from the Social. 
...It may not have been perfect, but she tried her best to say 
everything she wanted to say, putting her feelings into her gift.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>So she borrowed a little confidence from the Social. 
<story>...It may not have been perfect, but she tried her best to say 
<story>everything she wanted to say, putting her feelings into her gift.

data.text:
As for her friend, well, she was a little shocked, sure, but more 
than anything, she was happy. ...Heehee. I remember her 
jumping up and down, wailing tears of joy.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>As for her friend, well, she was a little shocked, sure, but more 
<story>than anything, she was happy. ...Heehee. I remember her 
<story>jumping up and down, wailing tears of joy.

data.text: If you tell Rob Roy how you feel, I'm sure she'll be just as happy.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>If you tell Rob Roy how you feel, I'm sure she'll be just as happy.

data.text:
――Don't worry. 
It doesn't matter how hard it is to say, as long as you say it 
like you mean it. 'Kay?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>――Don't worry. 
<story>It doesn't matter how hard it is to say, as long as you say it 
<story>like you mean it. 'Kay?

data.text: MMM! Delicious!! It's even more delicious after a long training session!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: MMM! Delicious!! It's even more delicious after a long training session!

data.text:
(...Uni-san has been acting strange lately. 
Perhaps I did something to offend her...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(...Uni-san has been acting strange lately. 
<story>Perhaps I did something to offend her...)

data.text:
(She's treated me so well, for so long, yet I haven't done a thing 
in return. I――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(She's treated me so well, for so long, yet I haven't done a thing 
<story>in return. I――)

data.text:
(――when I first enrolled, I started working at the school library... 
And I've had her on my mind, ever since I first sat at the 
circulation desk.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――when I first enrolled, I started working at the school library... 
<story>And I've had her on my mind, ever since I first sat at the 
<story>circulation desk.)

data.text:
(A curious regular visitor. She had a peculiar air about her, 
and her nose was always in a book.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(A curious regular visitor. She had a peculiar air about her, 
<story>and her nose was always in a book.)

data.text:
(The books she checked out were as curious as her. Collections 
of space photography, grand fantasies set on a galactic scale, 
deeply complex texts on aerospace engineering...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(The books she checked out were as curious as her. Collections 
<story>of space photography, grand fantasies set on a galactic scale, 
<story>deeply complex texts on aerospace engineering...)

data.text:
(――It was like peering into an undiscovered world, far beyond 
my imagination. Simply reading through her checkout history 
was enough to broaden my horizons.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――It was like peering into an undiscovered world, far beyond 
<story>my imagination. Simply reading through her checkout history 
<story>was enough to broaden my horizons.)

data.text:
(How did the world look through her eyes? 
Just what sort of sights could she see?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(How did the world look through her eyes? 
<story>Just what sort of sights could she see?)

data.text:
(――I wanted to know. 
To see the same brilliant world as her...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――I wanted to know. 
<story>To see the same brilliant world as her...)

data.text:
E-excuse me...! 
You're Neo Universe-senpai, aren't you...?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>E-excuse me...! 
<story>You're Neo Universe-senpai, aren't you...?

data.text:
(When I first called out to her, I tactlessly blurted out her name. 
And yet she was willing to teach me so many things―― 
To bring them into my life.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(When I first called out to her, I tactlessly blurted out her name. 
<story>And yet she was willing to teach me so many things―― 
<story>To bring them into my life.)

data.text:
(She's always given me so much. 
But what have I ever given in return...?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(She's always given me so much. 
<story>But what have I ever given in return...?)

data.text: .....y .......Rob Roy.... What's wrong?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>.....y .......Rob Roy.... What's wrong?

data.text: Do you have a tummyache? Or... Are ya sleepy? You were training very very hard, after all!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Do you have a tummyache? Or... Are ya sleepy? You were training very very hard, after all!

data.text:
Oh, sorry! No, I'm all right, I can finish eating! 
...........It's just, well. There's just something I'm worried about, 
I suppose.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Oh, sorry! No, I'm all right, I can finish eating! 
<story>...........It's just, well. There's just something I'm worried about, 
<story>I suppose.

data.text: ...I was thinking, I still haven't given back to Uni-san at all. Despite everything she does for me...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: ...I was thinking, I still haven't given back to Uni-san at all. Despite everything she does for me...

data.text: Well... I know Universe's been real nice to you lately. But why're you so hung up on it?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Well... I know Universe's been real nice to you lately. But why're you so hung up on it?

data.text:
What? Umm... She's always doing so much for me, but I've never 
returned the favor, so I feel guilty...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>What? Umm... She's always doing so much for me, but I've never 
<story>returned the favor, so I feel guilty...

data.text: Ohhh? Don't worry! If she does you a kindness, just say "Thank you" and it'll all be OK!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Ohhh? Don't worry! If she does you a kindness, just say "Thank you" and it'll all be OK!

data.text: ――I'm always gettin' helped out!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>――I'm always gettin' helped out!

data.text: Dober's got her head on straight, so she looks after me every day!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Dober's got her head on straight, so she looks after me every day!

data.text:
I get homesick and cry a whole lot, but Hishiama-san's always 
there to make me feel better!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>I get homesick and cry a whole lot, but Hishiama-san's always 
<story>there to make me feel better!

data.text: And I want to race with my friends a lot! Suzuka's always willing to go on a run!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: And I want to race with my friends a lot! Suzuka's always willing to go on a run!

data.text: My momma, my poppa, my neighbors, too. They all did a whole lot for me. And I've always given them a great big "Thank you" in return!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: My momma, my poppa, my neighbors, too. They all did a whole lot for me. And I've always given them a great big "Thank you" in return!

data.text: I never say "sorry" to a helping hand. I smile and say "Thank you", and they smile back!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: I never say "sorry" to a helping hand. I smile and say "Thank you", and they smile back!

data.text: I bet Universe'll smile too! All you need to do accept her kindness and say "Thank you"!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: I bet Universe'll smile too! All you need to do accept her kindness and say "Thank you"!

data.text: ―――Accept her kindness...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>―――Accept her kindness...

data.text: (――Have I truly been "accepting" Uni-san's kindness...?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(――Have I truly been "accepting" Uni-san's kindness...?)

title: I want to 『be there』 for you
